position: Early Stage Deep-Tech Investor at pi Ventures

experience.title: Senior Vice President & Head, Product
experience.description: Product Initiatives•	Led a 15+ member Product, Design and Analytics team building products across the logistics spectrum•	Transformed product culture by emphasizing outcomes over outputs, championing data-driven decision-making, and integrating user feedback into strategic direction•	Led the design process of breaking up large systems into smaller subsystems and microservices to drive better scalability across products•	Pioneered and executed a strategy for on-demand hyperlocal delivery, achieving 50% of largest competitor's scale within 18 months•	Built a hyperlocal delivery allocation platform used by 5,000+ riders to deliver 50,000+ orders per day; platform optimises for cost, rider experience and customer experience on a real-time basis•	Integrated 4 distinct rider applications into 1 unified application catering to food, e-commerce and quick-commerce deliveries•	Launched industry first features like automated profile verification and Instant withdrawal, leading to higher rider NPS•	Building a plug-and-play logistics SaaS platform being used by Meesho and Meesho’s logistics providers to manage deliveries of 150k+ shipments a dayTransportBook•	Conceptualized TransportBook, a logistics business management application, through field visits and discussions with truckers and transporters across 5 cities•	Led product, growth and marketing for TransportBook; scaled it to 1MM+ downloads and #1 Transportation app in India•	Built the product with focus on ease of usage while adding complex accounting features; scaled to INR 15 Cr of transaction recorded daily with INR 1 Cr+ daily payment volumeBusiness Initiatives•	Led ‘Hyperlocal’ business for Loadshare – drove growth from 25L per month to 7.5 Cr per month in 2 years•	Steered Loadshare intra-city business (70% of revenue) through Covid; helped business get back to pre-Covid levels in 4 months
experience.description_html: Product Initiatives• Led a 15+ member Product, Design and Analytics team building products across the logistics spectrum• Transformed product culture by emphasizing outcomes over outputs, championing data-driven decision-making, and integrating user feedback into strategic direction• Led the design process of breaking up large systems into smaller subsystems and microservices to drive better scalability across products• Pioneered and executed a strategy for on-demand hyperlocal delivery, achieving 50% of largest competitor's scale within 18 months• Built a hyperlocal delivery allocation platform used by 5,000+ riders to deliver 50,000+ orders per day; platform optimises for cost, rider experience and customer experience on a real-time basis• Integrated 4 distinct rider applications into 1 unified application catering to food, e-commerce and quick-commerce deliveries• Launched industry first features like automated profile verification and Instant withdrawal, leading to higher rider NPS• Building a plug-and-play logistics SaaS platform being used by Meesho and Meesho’s logistics providers to manage deliveries of 150k+ shipments a dayTransportBook• Conceptualized TransportBook, a logistics business management application, through field visits and discussions with truckers and transporters across 5 cities• Led product, growth and marketing for TransportBook; scaled it to 1MM+ downloads and #1 Transportation app in India• Built the product with focus on ease of usage while adding complex accounting features; scaled to INR 15 Cr of transaction recorded daily with INR 1 Cr+ daily payment volumeBusiness Initiatives• Led ‘Hyperlocal’ business for Loadshare – drove growth from 25L per month to 7.5 Cr per month in 2 years• Steered Loadshare intra-city business (70% of revenue) through Covid; helped business get back to pre-Covid levels in 4 months

experience.title: Core Team Member | CA GST Business
experience.description: ClearTax is India’s largest taxation compliance platform for individuals and businessesPart of ClearTax Core Team | Led CA Focused Income Tax and GST Businesses- Delivered 60% YoY growth in Income Tax Returns filed by CAs on ClearTax with 35% growth in CA user- Delivered 45% growth in businesses for which GST returns are filed using ClearTax in 6 months- Developed long-term product strategy through deep user research and creation of dedicated User Insights team; defined CA segmentation through 250+ CA interviews, and identified pain points and delight points by segment- Deeply involved in translating customer understanding to product initiatives. Helped design, launch and iterate the Economic Times Awarded GST Annual Return (GSTR-9) feature on ClearTax

Helped design, launch and iterate the Economic Times Awarded GST Annual Return (GSTR-9) feature on ClearTax

experience.title: Vice President, Strategy
experience.description: NephroPlus is Asia's largest network of dialysis centers with 320+ centers and 4000+ people across 4 countriesPart of 6-member Executive Management Team responsible for all strategic and key operational decisions – Drove growth to 16.5x revenues (10x footprint) in 4.5 years and secured 2 rounds of equity fundingFund-Raising Initiatives−	Managed Series B fundraising efforts (without investment bank support) and secured $10 M funding from IFC and Bessemer Venture Partners−	Managed Series C fundraising efforts and secured $15 M funding from IFC and Sealink Capital Partners−	Led debt related discussions with venture debt providers for 4 tranches of venture debt;  later drove debt restructuring proceedings helping reduce cost of debt by 600+ bpsStrategic and Growth Initiatives−	Ran Enpidia - NephroPlus’s dialysis technician training academy; introduced franchising and expanded network from 1 to 15 locations	−	Spearheaded NephroPlus’s efforts to expand internationally; identifying priority countries,  defining entry strategies for focus countries and leading JV negotiations with partners−	Responsible for broadening service offering and increasing non-core revenue – non-core contribution to total revenue up 30% in 1 yearOperational Initiatives−	Led HR function with a focus on employee engagement and skill enhancement; oversaw increase in staff strength from 250 to 2000+−	Led North India Operations during pivotal North India growth phase (8x in 15 months)−	Spearheaded multiple cross-functional process improvement programs including partner evaluation process for new deals, new center launch process and supply chain management process
experience.description_html: NephroPlus is Asia's largest network of dialysis centers with 320+ centers and 4000+ people across 4 countriesPart of 6-member Executive Management Team responsible for all strategic and key operational decisions – Drove growth to 16.5x revenues (10x footprint) in 4.5 years and secured 2 rounds of equity fundingFund-Raising Initiatives− Managed Series B fundraising efforts (without investment bank support) and secured $10 M funding from IFC and Bessemer Venture Partners− Managed Series C fundraising efforts and secured $15 M funding from IFC and Sealink Capital Partners− Led debt related discussions with venture debt providers for 4 tranches of venture debt; later drove debt restructuring proceedings helping reduce cost of debt by 600+ bpsStrategic and Growth Initiatives− Ran Enpidia - NephroPlus’s dialysis technician training academy; introduced franchising and expanded network from 1 to 15 locations − Spearheaded NephroPlus’s efforts to expand internationally; identifying priority countries, defining entry strategies for focus countries and leading JV negotiations with partners− Responsible for broadening service offering and increasing non-core revenue – non-core contribution to total revenue up 30% in 1 yearOperational Initiatives− Led HR function with a focus on employee engagement and skill enhancement; oversaw increase in staff strength from 250 to 2000+− Led North India Operations during pivotal North India growth phase (8x in 15 months)− Spearheaded multiple cross-functional process improvement programs including partner evaluation process for new deals, new center launch process and supply chain management process

experience.title: Senior Business Analyst
experience.description: Consistently rated as a top performer and recipient of internal awards at a regional and global level; worked in telecom, media, energy and power in Asia, Africa and AustraliaSelect Engagements−	Improved profitability by 800% for the Wholesale Voice business of a large Australian telecom operator         ◦  	Responsible for delivery of initial assessment phase resulting in sale of additional engagement valued at $1.3 MM         ◦	Led 3 person team at client’s request to launch a routing optimization pilot across Asia, Europe and Australia         ◦	Awarded “Global Great Client Work Award”; engagement helped firm secure similar engagements in other markets −	Developed 3G auction strategy for telecom providers in SE Asia and Africa in conjunction with cross-cultural teams−	Evaluated iron-ore mine acquisition opportunity in Mauritania, Africa by assessing global market dynamics and country risk−	Conducted market due-diligence on a movie post-production and 2D-3D conversion player in US, UK and IndiaCompany Involvement−	Published multiple papers; awarded “Asia Pacific Knowledge Award” for innovative thought leadership on wholesale telecom −	Co-authored external whitepaper on international movie post-production market and 2D to 3D conversion market

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Worked to improve reliability of the VRF line of products at Blue Star. • Analysed multiple sets of real-time data to suggest improvements in the governing logic for stable mechanical operation of the air-conditioning unit• Suggested software and hardware improvements substantially reduced compressor failure rate - incorporated into the marketed product
